name: Block Runner (HanKan7)
description:
Block Runner is an exciting and engaging infinite runner game. Here in this game, a block keeps running the never-ending path, the user/player must control the block to surpass the obstacles. The more obstacles the player dodges, higher will be the score.

"Brackeys" youtube channel has been referred to make this game as its extension .

Misc info:

This is my first game and I'm trying to learn a lot from various sources from youtube  and as well as in  Udemy.

Hope you like the game. :)
